text:
Hi Everyone
So here is the context, I have data in firebase and i want to show it as crm card in table formate it this possible? if yes can anyone please share some examples or just a guidence/references will alos work.
Thanks

Hi Everyone,

Is there a way to create a search box where that call's an api as user is typing?
Similar to this? <https://www.grapecity.com/wijmo/demos/Input/AutoComplete/AsyncLoading/purejs>
Not at the moment, but we have a private beta in progress that allows this levels of extensibility. Let me know if you want to participate.
Can you please DM me your official e-mail?
<@U024JD2938W> this is the same for you as well.
